short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The greatest collection of UTF-8 face marks kaomojis and emoticons for your web browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The greatest collection of UTF-8 face marks (kaomoji) and emoticons for your web browser. 

✔️ Open-source
✔️ 100% secure and private
✔️ No copy-paste required
✔️ Easy and fast settings
✔️ Works with all websites
✔️ No advertisements. Absolutely free of charge!

➕ over 40,000 facemarks
➕ syncs with your browser profile
➕ reset recent
➕ set recent limit (10 - 100)
➕ set any category as default
➕ set last visited category as default
➕ copy to clipboard delay
➕ show/hide info messages

Facemarks made up of characters and grammar punctuations, may include non-Latin characters to allow for additional complexity and are used to express emotion in texting and cyber communication.
